trans-unit.source: Specifies permission to access Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问 Internet 资源的权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: WebPermissionAttribute allows you to declaratively specify which URI strings and regular expression strings your class can use.
trans-unit.target: WebPermissionAttribute 允许你以声明方式指定的 URI 字符串和正则表达式字符串可以使用你的类。

trans-unit.source: The security information specified in the WebPermissionAttribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which WebPermissionAttribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: WebPermissionAttribute 中指定的安全信息存储在特性目标，它是 WebPermissionAttribute 应用到的类的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The system accesses this information at run time.
trans-unit.target: 系统访问此信息在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> passed to the constructor determines the allowable WebPermissionAttribute targets.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>传递给构造函数用于确定允许 WebPermissionAttribute 目标。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The system uses the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> returned by the <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> method to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>返回<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>方法将属性目标的安全信息转换为可序列化的窗体存储在元数据。</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > WebPermissionAttribute is used only for [Declarative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8).
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> WebPermissionAttribute 仅用于[声明性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/97e21efd-6e89-4115-90d5-ad239513dad8)。

trans-unit.source: For [Imperative Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27), use the corresponding <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 有关[命令性安全](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/15aab1e1-6b7d-41ad-b102-c1ed7bedea27)，请使用相应<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>。</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with a value that specifies the security actions that can be performed on this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>类具有一个值，指定可以对此类执行的安全操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> value passed to this constructor specifies the allowable security actions that can be performed on this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>传递给此构造函数的值指定的可执行此类允许安全操作</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: action is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: action不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI string accepted by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由当前接受的 URI 字符串<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When applying <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> to your class, this property specifies what URI string will be accepted for use within your class.
trans-unit.target: 在将应用<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>到该类，此属性指定什么样的 URI 字符串将接受以用于中你的类。</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This permission is applied when the security system calls <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当安全系统调用<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>时应用此权限

trans-unit.source: This property is write-once.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是可写的后。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the URI accepted by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含 URI 的字符串接受当前<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Accept is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when you attempt to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 接受不<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>当你尝试设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to specify more than one Accept URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定多个接受的 URI，使用一个附加的属性声明语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern that describes the URI accepted by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置描述由当前接受的 URI 的正则表达式模式<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When applying <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> to your class, this property specifies what regular expression string will be accepted for use within your class.
trans-unit.target: 在将应用<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>到该类，此属性指定哪些正则表达式字符串将接受以用于中你的类。</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property is write-once.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是可写的后。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a regular expression pattern that describes the URI accepted by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含描述的 URI 的正则表达式模式字符串接受当前<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This string must be escaped according to the rules for encoding a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName> constructor string.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串必须转义根据规则编码<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=fullName>构造函数的字符串。

trans-unit.source: AcceptPattern is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when you attempt to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 不是 AcceptPattern <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>当你尝试设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to specify more than one Accept URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定多个接受的 URI，使用一个附加的属性声明语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI connection string controlled by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置受当前的 URI 连接字符串<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When applying <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> to your class, this property specifies what URI connection is accepted for use within your class.
trans-unit.target: 在将应用<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>到该类，此属性指定 URI 的连接接受以用于中你的类。</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property is write-once.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是可写的后。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the URI connection controlled by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含由当前控制 URI 连接字符串<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Connect is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when you attempt to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 连接不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>当你尝试设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to specify more than one Connect URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定多个连接 URI，使用一个附加的属性声明语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern that describes the URI connection controlled by the current <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置正则表达式模式，以描述由当前控制 URI 连接<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When applying <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> to your class, this property specifies what regular expression connect string is accepted for use within your class.
trans-unit.target: 应用时<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>到该类，此属性指定哪些正则表达式连接字符串以在你的类中使用接受</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This property is write-once.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是可写的后。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a regular expression pattern that describes the URI connection controlled by this <xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含描述控制此 URI 连接的正则表达式模式字符串<xref href="System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ConnectPattern is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when you attempt to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 不是 ConnectPattern <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>当你尝试设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to specify more than one connect URI, use an additional attribute declaration statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定多个连接 URI，使用一个附加的属性声明语句。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回的新实例<xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> method is called by the security system, not by application code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>由安全系统中，不是由应用程序代码调用方法。</xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>

trans-unit.source: The security information described by <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which <xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 所描述的安全信息<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储<xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>应用。</xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute> </xref:System.Net.WebPermissionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The system accesses the information at run time.
trans-unit.target: 系统访问运行时的信息。

trans-unit.source: The system uses the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> returned by <xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用<xref:System.Net.WebPermission>返回<xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>要转换的属性目标的安全信息存储在元数据中的可序列化形式。</xref:System.Net.SocketPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"></xref> corresponding to the security declaration.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.WebPermission"> </xref>对应的安全声明。
